name: v1.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add local env support to alias cmd by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/316
* Add autocomplete to dotenv command by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/318
* Improve failure output for commands by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/319
* Fixes #309 - Better GitHub API error messages by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/320
* Fix #271 - Add ask_vault_pass config setting by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/321
* Project detection: drop site folder requirement by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/326
* CLI config refactor and improvements by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/324


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.7.0...v1.8.0

name: v1.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update python check command to python3 by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/283
* Bump github.com/mitchellh/cli from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/285
* Add GitHub secret and deploy key to specified `--repo` by @codepuncher in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/288
* Add `--no-provision` flag to skip provisioning after generating keys by @codepuncher in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/292
* Use `--repo` when setting known hosts secret by @codepuncher in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/294
* Fix virtualenv shebangs updating by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/297
* Fix venv hook shell escaping by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/296

## New Contributors
* @codepuncher made their first contribution in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/288

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.6.1...v1.7.0

name: v1.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix version output for new projects by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/276
* Fix cross-link bug for virtualenv by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/282


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

name: v1.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Improve the un-initialized warning message by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/257
* Improve check command and bump python req to 3.8 by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/261
* Fix virtualenv in paths containing spaces by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/207
* Improve failure modes during new project creation by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/263
* test: use `T.TempDir` to create temporary test directory by @Juneezee in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/264
* Upgrade to go v1.17 by @TangRufus in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/266
* Use built-in testing.Setenv by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/267
* Update Dockerfile: go 1.17, bullseye, python3 by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/269
* Enable --debug by @E-VANCE in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/270
* Fixes #259 - use manual input for known hosts in `key generate` cmd by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/273
* Remove all ioutil usage by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/274

## New Contributors
* @Juneezee made their first contribution in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/264
* @E-VANCE made their first contribution in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/270

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.5.1...v1.6.0

name: v1.5.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix ssh-keyscan error handling in `key generate` command by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/253

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1

name: v1.5.0
body:
🌱 **[Join us on Roots Discourse to discuss the trellis-cli v1.5.0 release](https://discourse.roots.io/t/trellis-cli-v1-5-0-released/22112)**

## What's Changed
* Refactor `exec.Command` usage (includes some general output improvements) by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/250
* Improve `alias` command output by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/246
* Improve output for `db open` and `dotenv` by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/251
* Remove virtualenv install fallback by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/248
* Upgrade pip during `init` by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/252


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0

name: v1.4.0
body:
🌱 **[Join us on Roots Discourse to discuss the trellis-cli v1.4.0 release](https://discourse.roots.io/t/trellis-cli-v1-4-0-released/22050)**

## What's Changed
* Improve GitHub CLI detection/handling for `trellis key generate` by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/238
* Give python3 precedence for creating virtual environments by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/242
* Add `xdebug-tunnel open` and `xdebug-tunnel open` commands by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/244
* Improve `init` error messages for virtualenv by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/245
* Fail earlier in `new` if initialization fails by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/245
* Fix autocompletion for arguments when flags are present by @swalkinshaw in https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/240


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

name: v1.3.0
body:
🌱 **[Join us on Roots Discourse to discuss the trellis-cli v1.3.0 release](https://discourse.roots.io/t/trellis-cli-v1-3-0-released/21995)**

* Add a per-project CLI config file (`.trellis/cli.yml`) [#227]
* Add `open` command [#228]
* Add `--verbose` option for Ansible commands [#231]
* Add `--force` option to `init` [#232]
* Improve spinner output (better for non-TTY contexts like CI platforms) [#233]
* Add `key generate` command to help set up continuous deployments [#235]

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/compare/v1.2.2...v1.3.0

name: v1.2.2
body: * Fix CLI autocompletion [#222]

name: v1.2.1
body: * Fix virtualenv warning appearing during `trellis new` [#221]

name: v1.2.0
body:
* Improved `trellis init` output [#220]
* Show warning on uninitialized projects and suggest running `trellis init` [#220]

name: v1.1.0
body:
*  Fix `trellis provision development` for Vagrant [#209]
*  Replace Sequel Pro with Sequel Ace in `trellis db open` [#210]
*  Add Python to requirements for `trellis check` [#216]
*  Run galaxy install before `trellis up` by default [#217]
*  Warn and suggest to run `trellis init` in a non-initialized project [#219]

name: v1.0.0
body:
* Fix #199 - Add arm64 arch for builds (support Apple M1) [#200]
* `InitCommand`: Show pip stack trace when failed [#139]
* Add plugin system [#144]
* Improve provision command help text [#150]
* Use go 1.16's embed feature for static files [#157]
* Add option for droplet image (default Ubuntu 20.04) [#162]
* Improve `vault encrypt` command usage [#197]

name: v0.9.2
body:
- Add trellis version option for `new` command [#140]
- Fix `droplet create `argument validation [#141]
- Fix #142 - Quote/escape paths in venv hook [#143]

name: v0.9.1
body:
- Add branch option to deploy [[#126](https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/126)]
- Fix `vault decrypt <env>` command [[#133](https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/133)]
- Update mitchellh/cli package [[#137](https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/137)]
- Add version update notices [[#136](https://github.com/roots/trellis-cli/pull/136)]

name: v0.7.0
body:
## Changelog

* Make Virtualenv activate idempotent #93
* Improve consistency of required/optional argument handling in commands #86 
* Improve consistency of `ENVIRONMENT` argument handling in commands #87
* Improve consistency of `SITE` argument handling in commands #88
